name: Daemon
pages: From the smoldering depths, it rises. Cinders cling to its hide, whispering of millennia spent in infernal furnaces. Born in the heart of forgotten volcanoes and bound to the Nether it jealously guards.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Large$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mini Boss$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Very Rare/Rare$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Walks$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 80hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 8hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Underworld (Very Rare), Nether (Rare)
$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Can cast $(l:firespout)Firespout$().$(br)- Immune to fire.$(br)- Strong knockback.
